instructions: Tap Watch Now, scroll down to the Apple TV+ row, then do one of the following: Start a free one-year Apple TV+ subscription: Tap Enjoy 1 Year Free (available for eligible Apple ID accounts). See the Get Apple TV+ free for one year website . Start a free 7-day trial: Tap Try Apple TV+ Free (available for eligible Apple ID accounts). Apple TV+ provides one free trial per subscriber or family. Start a monthly subscription: Tap Subscribe. Review the subscription details, then confirm with Face ID, Touch ID, or your Apple ID.

Tap Watch Now, then scroll down to browse the available channels. To watch a channel, do one of the following: Start a free trial: Tap Try It Free (available for eligible Apple ID accounts). Each Apple TV channel provides one free trial per subscriber or family. The length of the trial may vary. Start a monthly subscription: Tap Subscribe. Review the subscription details, then confirm with Face ID, Touch ID, or your Apple ID.

Tap Watch Now, then tap the My Account button or your profile picture at the top right. Tap any of the following: Connected Apps: Turn apps on or off. Connected apps appear in the Apple TV app on all your devices where you re signed in with your Apple ID . Manage Subscriptions: Tap a subscription to change or cancel it. Clear Play History: Remove your viewing history from all your Apple devices.
